originalText.text:
Cameron is EXCELLENT at working with you on your auditions. What I especially love is how he takes the time to rehearse and go over the script with you in specific detail.

I can't recommend him enough. His goal is to make you deliver as excellent an audition as is possible. And his studio is perfect.

Thank you, Cameron! It's great working with you and I look forward to doing so again.

text.text:

originalText.text: Self Tape Space is beyond amazing!!  I needed to have my 9 yr. old son professionally taped for a last minute audition.  Not only did Cameron accommodate my son the evening before it was due, he was a true professional in every sense of the word.  He was so great and patient with my son, offering his expertise and invaluable advice.  He’s also a fantastic reader.  He sent the file to us within 15 minutes of taping.  He used top of the line equipment and my son’s agency was very pleased with the results.  We plan to use this service for any future self-tape auditions.  I would highly recommend Self Tape Space for an excellent experience and audition tape.

originalText.text: Cameron's service was top notch from start to end.  My daughter was nervous going in, but had a great coaching and was able to put the best of her on the tape.  He is very professional but not business-like. You can tell he really cares as he is an actor himself.  Delivery was fast and we are very happy with the quality of the final tape.  I highly recommend him.

I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Cameron! you rock... my only regret is not meeting you sooner :) thank you for your patience, insights and impeccable service. I didn't make an appointment to meet with him before taping because the reviews were so great! the quality of the video, sound and lighting is top notch, the atmosphere is warm and inviting. Thank you so much Cameron! :) you are my go to guy now for every taped audition.

originalText.text: Cameron is fantastic! He recorded slate shots and media reels for me. Cameron was extremely dedicated in making sure that I loved how the material I was recording looked and felt. All of my videos were well lit and extreamly professional looking. The thing I loved most about my experiences was that Cameron made me feel comfortable and at ease so that I could perform my best work. He is an actor himself and he knows how overwhelming and time consuming the reel process can be. He is patient and encouraging! I hightly recommend The Self Tape Space for all of your recording needs!
